children.transactionName:
SELECT
      t.taskTitle AS taskTitle,
      t.taskKey AS taskKey,
      t.taskType AS taskType,
      t.timeFrom AS timeFrom, t.timeTo AS timeTo,
      t.operationType AS operationType,
      t.operateTargetType AS operateTargetType,
      t.shareDestination AS shareDestination,
      t.operateTargetKey AS operateTargetKey,
      t.remark AS remark,
      t.operateBy AS operateBy,
      t.actionTime AS actionTime,
      t.createTime AS createTime
    FROM
      tbl_task_base t
    WHERE
      t.action IN (0, 1)
    ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT
        base.taskTitle AS taskTitle,
        base.taskKey AS taskKey,
        base.taskType AS taskType,
        base.timeFrom AS timeFrom,
        base.timeTo AS timeTo,
        base.operationType AS operationType,
        base.operateTargetType AS operateTargetType,
        base.shareDestination AS shareDestination,
        base.operateTargetKey AS operateTargetKey,
        base.remark AS remark,
        course.courseType AS courseType,

        reward.taskRewardKey AS taskRewardKey,
        reward.taskKey AS taskKey,
        reward.rewardType AS rewardType,
        reward.rewardGoodsKey AS rewardGoodsKey,
        reward.taskFrequency AS taskFrequency,
        reward.studyTime AS studyTime,
        reward.rewardAmount AS rewardAmount,
        reward.isDefaultReward AS isDefaultReward,
        issues.taskFrequency AS studyTaskFrequency,
        issues.alreadyFrequency AS alreadyFrequency,
        issues.issueStatus AS issueStatus,
        issues.userKey AS userKey
    FROM
        tbl_task_base base
        LEFT JOIN tbl_course_base course
        ON base.operateTargetKey = course.courseKey
        LEFT JOIN tbl_task_reward_info reward
        ON base.taskKey = reward.taskKey
        LEFT JOIN tbl_task_user_issues issues
        ON issues.taskRewardKey = reward.taskRewardKey AND issues.userKey = ? AND issues.taskFinishTime = ?
    WHERE
        base.taskKey in
         (  
            ?
         )

SELECT
        base.taskTitle AS taskTitle,
        base.taskKey AS taskKey,
        base.taskType AS taskType,
        base.timeFrom AS timeFrom,
        base.timeTo AS timeTo,
        base.operationType AS operationType,
        base.operateTargetType AS operateTargetType,
        base.shareDestination AS shareDestination,
        base.operateTargetKey AS operateTargetKey,
        base.remark AS remark,
        course.courseType AS courseType,

        reward.taskRewardKey AS taskRewardKey,
        reward.taskKey AS taskKey,
        reward.rewardType AS rewardType,
        reward.rewardGoodsKey AS rewardGoodsKey,
        reward.taskFrequency AS taskFrequency,
        reward.studyTime AS studyTime,
        reward.rewardAmount AS rewardAmount,
        reward.isDefaultReward AS isDefaultReward,
        issues.taskFrequency AS studyTaskFrequency,
        issues.alreadyFrequency AS alreadyFrequency,
        issues.issueStatus AS issueStatus,
        issues.userKey AS userKey
    FROM
      tbl_task_base base
      LEFT JOIN tbl_course_base course
      ON base.operateTargetKey = course.courseKey
      LEFT JOIN tbl_task_reward_info reward
      ON base.taskKey = reward.taskKey
      LEFT JOIN tbl_task_user_issues issues
      ON issues.taskRewardKey = reward.taskRewardKey AND issues.userKey = ?
    WHERE
      base.taskKey in
       (  
          ?
       , 
          ?
       )

SELECT
        base.taskTitle AS taskTitle,
        base.taskKey AS taskKey,
        base.taskType AS taskType,
        base.timeFrom AS timeFrom,
        base.timeTo AS timeTo,
        base.operationType AS operationType,
        base.operateTargetType AS operateTargetType,
        base.shareDestination AS shareDestination,
        base.operateTargetKey AS operateTargetKey,
        base.remark AS remark,
        course.courseType AS courseType,

        reward.taskRewardKey AS taskRewardKey,
        reward.taskKey AS taskKey,
        reward.rewardType AS rewardType,
        reward.rewardGoodsKey AS rewardGoodsKey,
        reward.taskFrequency AS taskFrequency,
        reward.studyTime AS studyTime,
        reward.rewardAmount AS rewardAmount,
        reward.isDefaultReward AS isDefaultReward,
        issues.taskFrequency AS studyTaskFrequency,
        issues.alreadyFrequency AS alreadyFrequency,
        issues.issueStatus AS issueStatus,
        issues.userKey AS userKey
    FROM
        tbl_task_base base
        LEFT JOIN tbl_course_base course
        ON base.operateTargetKey = course.courseKey
        LEFT JOIN tbl_task_reward_info reward
        ON base.taskKey = reward.taskKey
        LEFT JOIN tbl_task_user_issues issues
        ON issues.taskRewardKey = reward.taskRewardKey AND issues.userKey = ? AND issues.taskFinishTime = ?
    WHERE
        base.taskKey in
         (  
            ?
         , 
            ?
         )
